data.name: Secret Agent
data.description:
<h1>Description:

You're a secret agent who has intercepted poorly scrambled web addresses that are crucial to your operation.

Lucky for you, the people who scrambled the addresses aren't the brightest. All the did was change the order in which www. and .com appear.

Time for you to show off your programming skills to the other agents by automating the assembly of the web address.

Given a string  ```string```, return a proper web address.

<h1>Notes: 

<li> All letters in the string will be used in the web address
<li> If you are given an empty string, return it.
<li> All strings will be valid scrambled web addresses if not empty

<h1>Example:

```
string = 'dogs.comwww.'

Should return www.dogs.com

string = .comwww.codewars

Should return www.codewars.com

```
